tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE subscriber_information (
  subscriber_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  subscriber_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  subscriber_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  subscriber_phone VARCHAR(15),
  subscriber_address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE device_status ( 
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    status VARCHAR(20), 
    last_update TIMESTAMP, 
    subscriber_id INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (subscriber_id) REFERENCES subscriber_information(subscriber_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE network_logs ( 
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    event VARCHAR(100), 
    log_time TIMESTAMP, 
    device_id INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE subscribers (
    subscriber_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    subscriber_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (subscriber_id) REFERENCES subscribers(subscriber_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_status (
    network_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    network_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    network_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    device_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE billing_info (
    billing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    subscriber_id INT,
    billing_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    payment_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (subscriber_id) REFERENCES subscribers(subscriber_id)
);

CREATE TABLE logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    log_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    device_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id)
);
